Hospital.Schedules
Interface Appointable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BloodAnalysis, Cast, DoctorPatientAppointment, MedicalTest, Medication, Surgery, Treatment, UltraSoundScan, XRayScan
public interface Appointable

An interface for objects that can have an associated appointment (eg. a treatment)

Method Summary
 Appointment getAppointment()
          Returns the Appointment for this Appointable.
 TimeFrameConstraint getConstraints()
          Returns the constraints this Appointable must satisfy for the Patient.
 String[] getNeededItems()
          Returns a list of all needed items for this treatment.
 List<MultiScheduleGroup> getScheduleGroups()
          Returns the resources of the hospital that are needed for this Appointable.
 TimeFrameDelay getTimeFrameDelay()
          Returns a TimeFrameDelay object that waits the needed time during scheduling based on the current time.
 void setAppointment(Appointment appointment)
          Sets the Appointment of this Appointable.
 

Method Detail

getAppointment

Appointment getAppointment()
Returns the Appointment for this Appointable.

Returns:
Appointment

setAppointment

void setAppointment(Appointment appointment)
Sets the Appointment of this Appointable.

Parameters:
appointment - Appointment to set.

getConstraints

TimeFrameConstraint getConstraints()
Returns the constraints this Appointable must satisfy for the Patient.

Returns:
Normally no constraints must be satisfied.

getScheduleGroups

List<MultiScheduleGroup> getScheduleGroups()
Returns the resources of the hospital that are needed for this Appointable. These include normally: a nurse and a machine.

Returns:
A list of Groups to search from the world.

getTimeFrameDelay

TimeFrameDelay getTimeFrameDelay()
Returns a TimeFrameDelay object that waits the needed time during scheduling based on the current time.

Returns:
Returns a new TimeFrameDelay that makes the basic TimeFrame for scheduling

getNeededItems

String[] getNeededItems()
Returns a list of all needed items for this treatment.

Returns:
List of names of items
